A '''glistering melon slice''' is an inedible [[item]] used as a [[brewing]] ingredient for [[potions of Healing]].

=== Trading ===
{{Trade sources}}

== Usage ==
Despite being crafted with a [[melon slice]], a glistering melon slice cannot be eaten, unlike a [[golden apple]] or [[golden carrot]].

=== Brewing ingredient ===
{{Brewing
|head=1
|Glistering Melon Slice
|Mundane Potion
|base=Water Bottle
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Glistering Melon Slice
|Potion of Healing
|showvariants=1
|foot=1}}

=== Piglins ===
[[Piglin]]s run toward any glistering melon slice item on the ground and inspect it for 6 seconds {{in|java}} or 8 seconds {{in|bedrock}}<ref>{{bug|MCPE-99448||Piglins need 8 seconds to barter, while they only need 6 in java}}</ref> before putting it in their inventory.
